notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Conceptualization, F.A.R.; Writing—Original Draft Preparation, F.A.R.; Writing—Pathogenesis section, M.S.A.Z.; Writing—Viral Survivability section, G.A.K.; Writing—Vaccine section, D.M.S.; Writing—Epidemiology section, A.D.A.-N.; Review and Editing, F.A.R. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
